attributes.action: admit that he and the labour government have failed to maintain the standards expected of the elected government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the labour government has continually failed to maintain the standards expected of the elected representatives,  Mr Brown has failed to provide the promises that were made by the Labour Party in 1997 on election to power,  therefore the Prime Minister should resign. The standards of honesty and integrity of all MP's has been permitted to decline for 10 years and public funds have been wasted paying these useless MP's

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot accept petitions which contain party political material, such as references to political parties. Guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
